background: For use as a background color, in components such as Page and Frame backgrounds.
background-hovered: For use when an action or navigation is used on a background.
background-pressed: For use when an action or navigation is used on a background.
background-selected: For use in the selected item in navigation
surface: For use as a background color, in components such as Card, Modal, and Popover.
surface-neutral: For use as a background color in neutral badges.
surface-neutral-hovered: For use as a hovered background color in neutral badges.
surface-neutral-pressed: For use as a pressed background color in neutral badges.
surface-neutral-disabled: For use as a disabled background color in neutral badges.
surface-neutral-subdued: For use as a background color in neutral banners.
surface-subdued: For use as a subdued background color, in components such as Card, Modal, and Popover.
surface-disabled: For use as a surface color on disabled interactive elements such as option list items and action list items when in a disabled state.
surface-hovered: For use as a surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a hovered state.
surface-pressed: For use as a surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a pressed state.
surface-depressed: For use as a surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a depressed state.
surface-search-field: For use as a background color, in components on surface elements such as SearchField
backdrop: For use as the background color of the backdrop component for navigation and modal. This color has an alpha of `0.5`.
overlay: For use as the background color of elements which lay on top of surfaces to obscure their contents. This color has an alpha of `0.5`.
shadow-from-dim-light: For use in building shadows for modals. This color has an alpha of `0.02`.
shadow-from-ambient-light: For use in building shadows for popovers, and cards. This color has an alpha of `0.05`.
shadow-from-direct-light: For use in building shadows for popovers and cards. This color has an alpha of `0.15`.
hint-from-direct-light: For use in building shadows scrollables.
border: For use as the default border on elements.
border-neutral-subdued: For use as the border on banners.
border-hovered: Used for borders on hovered interactive elements
border-disabled: Used for disabled borders on interactive elements
border-subdued: For use as a subdued border on elements.
border-depressed: For use as a border on depressed elements.
border-shadow: For use as an additional bottom border on elements.
border-shadow-subdued: For use as an additional, subdued bottom border on elements.
divider: For use as a divider between elements.
icon: For use as the fill color of icons.
icon-hovered: For use as the fill color of hovered icons.
icon-pressed: For use as the fill color of pressed icons.
icon-disabled: For use as the fill color of disabled icons.
icon-subdued: For use as the fill color of subdued icons.
text: For use as a text color.
text-disabled: For use as a disabled text color and as a placeholder text color.
text-subdued: For use as a subdued text color.
interactive: Used for links, plain buttons, and as the fill color for selected checkboxes and radio buttons.
interactive-disabled: Used for disabled links and plain buttons.
interactive-hovered: Used for hovered links and plain buttons.
interactive-pressed: Used for pressed links and plain buttons.
icon-interactive: For use as an interactive icon fill color
focused: For use in the focus ring on interactive elements.
surface-selected: For use as a surface color in selected interactive elements, in components such as action list and resource list.
surface-selected-hovered: For use as a surface color in selected interactive elements that are hovered, in components such as action list and resource list.
surface-selected-pressed: For use as a surface color in selected interactive elements that are pressed, in components such as action list and resource list.
icon-on-interactive: For use as a fill color for icons on interactive elements.
text-on-interactive: For use as a text color on interactive elements.
action-secondary: Used for secondary buttons and tertiary buttons, as well as in form elements as a background color and pontentially other secondary surfaces.
action-secondary-disabled: Used as a disabled state for secondary buttons
action-secondary-hovered: Used as a hovered state for secondary buttons
action-secondary-pressed: Used as a pressed state for secondary buttons
action-secondary-depressed: Used as a depressed state for secondary buttons
action-primary: Used as the background color for primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.
action-primary-disabled: Used as the background color for disabled primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.
action-primary-hovered: Used as the background color for hovered primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.
action-primary-pressed: Used as the background color for pressed primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.
action-primary-depressed: Used as the background color for pressed primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.
icon-on-primary: For use as a fill color for icons on primary actions. Not for use in icons on navigation and tabs.
text-on-primary: For use as a text color on primary actions. Not for use in text on navigation and tabs.
text-primary: For use as primary text color on background. For use in text in components such as Navigation.
text-primary-hovered: For use as primary hovered text color on background. For use in text in components such as Navigation.
text-primary-pressed: For use as primary pressed text color on background. For use in text in components such as Navigation.
surface-primary-selected: Used as a surface color to indicate selected interactive states in navigation and tabs.
surface-primary-selected-hovered: Used as a surface color to indicate selected interactive states that are hovered in navigation and tabs.
surface-primary-selected-pressed: Used as a surface color to indicate selected interactive states that are pressed in navigation and tabs.
border-critical: For use as a border on critical components such as an outline on interactive elements in an error state.
border-critical-subdued: For use as a border on critical components such as banners.
border-critical-disabled: For use as a disabled border on critical components such as banners, and as an outline on interactive elements in an error state.
icon-critical: For use as an icon fill color on top of critical elements.
surface-critical: For use as a surface color on critical elements including badges.
surface-critical-subdued: For use as a subdued surface color on critical elements including banners.
surface-critical-subdued-hovered: For use as a surface color on critical interactive elements including action list items in a hovered state.
surface-critical-subdued-pressed: For use as a surface color on critical interactive elements including action list items in a pressed state.
surface-critical-subdued-depressed: For use as a surface color on critical interactive elements including action list items in a depressed state.
text-critical: For use as a text color in inert critical elements such as exception list. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.
action-critical: For use as the background color for destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.
action-critical-disabled: For use as the background color for disabled destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.
action-critical-hovered: For use as the background color for hovered destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.
action-critical-pressed: For use as the background color for pressed destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.
action-critical-depressed: For use as the background color for depressed destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.
icon-on-critical: For use as a fill color for icons on critical actions.
text-on-critical: For use as a text color on critical actions.
interactive-critical: For use as the text color for destructive interactive elements: links, plain buttons, error state of selected checkboxes and radio buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.
interactive-critical-disabled: For use as a text color in disabled destructive plain buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.
interactive-critical-hovered: For use as a text color in hovered destructive plain buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.
interactive-critical-pressed: For use as a text color in pressed destructive plain buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.
border-warning: For use as a border on warning components such as...
border-warning-subdued: For use as a border on warning components such as banners.
icon-warning: For use as an icon fill color on top of warning elements.
surface-warning: For use as a surface color on warning elements including badges.
surface-warning-subdued: For use as a subdued surface color on warning elements including banners.
surface-warning-subdued-hovered: For use as a subdued surface color on warning elements including banners.
surface-warning-subdued-pressed: For use as a subdued surface color on warning elements including banners.
text-warning: For use as a text color in inert critical elements such as exception list. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.
border-highlight: For use as a border on informational components such as...
border-highlight-subdued: For use as a border on informational components such as banners.
icon-highlight: For use as an icon fill color on top of informational elements.
surface-highlight: For use as a surface color on information elements including badges.
surface-highlight-subdued: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.
surface-highlight-subdued-hovered: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.
surface-highlight-subdued-pressed: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.
text-highlight: For use as a text color in inert informational elements. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.
border-success: For use as a border on success components such as text inputs.
border-success-subdued: For use as a border on success components such as banners.
icon-success: For use as an icon fill color on top of success elements.
surface-success: For use as a surface color on success elements including badges.
surface-success-subdued: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.
surface-success-subdued-hovered: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.
surface-success-subdued-pressed: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.
text-success: For use as a text color in inert success elements. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.
decorative-one-icon: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-one-surface: For use as a decorative surface color.
decorative-one-text: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-two-icon: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-two-surface: For use as a decorative surface color.
decorative-two-text: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-three-icon: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-three-surface: For use as a decorative surface color.
decorative-three-text: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-four-icon: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-four-surface: For use as a decorative surface color.
decorative-four-text: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-five-icon: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.
decorative-five-surface: For use as a decorative surface color.
decorative-five-text: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.
